formulas.name: varEndAssignment
formulas.expression:
IF( {!Require_Change} == 'End Assignment', "Assignment Change Request: End Assignment
" + "Assignment End Date " + {!End_Date_to_TXT} + "
" + "Reason: " + {!Reason_EndofAssignment_Screen} , "")

formulas.description: Formula for Pay and Bill Rage
formulas.name: varPayandBillRate
formulas.expression:
IF( {!Require_Change} == 'Pay and Bill Rate', "Assignment Change Request: Pay and Bill Rate
" + "Change Effective Date " + {!Effective_Date_to_TXT} + "
" + "New STD Bill Rate " + {!New_STD_Bill_Rate} + "
" + "New OT Bill Rate " + {!New_OT_Bill_Rate} + "
" + "New TD Bill Rate " + {!New_DT_Bill_Rate} + "
" + "New STD Pay Rate " + {!New_STD_Pay_Rate} + "
" + "New OT Pay Rate " + {!New_OT_Pay_Rate} + "
" + "New TD Pay Rate " + {!New_DT_Pay_Rate} , "")

formulas.name: varPayRates
formulas.expression:
IF( {!Require_Change} == 'Pay Rates', "Assignment Change Request: Pay Rates
" + "Change Effective Date " + {!Effective_Date_to_TXT} + "
" + "New STD Pay Rate " + {!New_STD_Pay_Rate} + "
" + "New OT Pay Rate " + {!New_OT_Pay_Rate} + "
" + "New TD Pay Rate " + {!New_DT_Pay_Rate} , "")

formulas.name: varPerdiem
formulas.expression: "Placement Status Change Assignment Start Date Delay"

formulas.name: varPlacementStatusChange
formulas.expression:
IF( {!Require_Change} == 'Placement Status Change', "Effective Date: " + {!Effective_Date_to_TXT} + "
" + "Placement Status Change: " + {!CR1_Placement_Status_Change} + "
" + "Reason: " + {!Reason_PlacementStatusChange_Screen} + "
" ,"")

formulas.name: varRequestDetails
formulas.expression:
"Request
" + "Placement ID: " + {!Placement_ID} + "
" + "First Name: " + {!First_Name} + "
" + "Last Name " + {!Last_Name} + "
" + "Comment: " + {!Request_Summary_Screen} + "
" + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Allocation and Producers', {!varAllocationandProducers}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Assignment Extension', {!varAssignmentExtension}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Assignment Start Date Delay', {!varAssignmentStartDateDelay}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Bill Rates', {!varBillRates}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Contract to Hire', {!varContracttoHire}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'End Assignment', {!varEndAssignment}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Pay Rates', {!varPayRates}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Pay and Bill Rate', {!varPayandBillRate}, "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Placement Status Change', {!varPlacementStatusChange} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Time Sheet Approvers', {!varTimeSheetApprovers} , "") + IF ({!Require_Change} == 'Others', {!varOthers}, "")

fields.name: RequestNumber
fields.fieldText: Account request with Case Number# {!GetCaseNumber.CaseNumber} has been created.
